overview: A British Sanitary Engineer, goes on holiday with a set of plans for a new secret weapon which he has mistaken for his new plumbing invention. Everyone is hunting for him, including the Russians.  The Russians find him and offer him a job in the Kremlin doing research (on plumbing he believes).  He accepts, arrives in Russia and falls in love with Tania, a secret agent.  And then discovers the true nature of the plans he is carrying...
tagline: The story of the Diplomat, The Plumber and the Beautiful Spy
title: Top Secret
